vendor_name: Cape Sounio, A Grecotel Resort to Live
title: Luxurious Athens Riviera Escape near Temple of Poseidon with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner & Two Private Beaches
description:
If you’re dreaming of Greek paradise, with golden sands and turquoise waters, the elegant Cape Sounio Grecotel Boutique Resort is for you. Located in Sounio, this idyllic part of the world is best known as the home of the Temple of Poseidon, one of the major monuments of the Golden Age of Athens. Grab glimpses of this iconic cultural landmark from your perfectly placed accommodation, all minimalistically furnished in a terracotta palette that seamlessly merge into the unspoiled landscape. Take a moment to appreciate the crystal-clear Aegean Sea next to gentle crescsent-shaped beaches, savour authentic Greek food and international cuisine at the onsite gourmet restaurants, or celebrate the Full Moon with a vibrant beach party.

Sounio is one of those perfect holiday destinations that allow you to do as much or little as you like. Spend your days relaxing on the resort’s two private beaches, go sailing, explore the majestic site of the Temple of Poseidon, or ask for walking routes available through the picturesque Sounio National Park. If you're feeling adventurous, take a trip to Athens, just one hour's drive away, where you can visit the Acropolis Museum, marvel at the Parthenon or take the cable car up Mount Lycabettus and enjoy the panoramic views.
location_description: Cape Sounio, A Grecotel Resort to Live

vendor_name: Cape Sounio, A Grecotel Resort to Live
title: Picturesque Greek Getaway with Daily Breakfast & Dinner
description: A Greek getaway awaits at the Cape Sounio Grecotel Exclusive Resort, located an hour’s drive from Athens and perfectly positioned for spectacular views of Poseidon’s Temple. Staying in a Superior Bungalow, you’ll benefit from the following exclusive inclusions: a daily buffet breakfast, nightly dinner, a welcome drink for each adult, and wine and fresh fruits in your room on arrival. Plus, one child aged 11 and under stays free, with dedicated all-day kids' snacks included.
location_description: Cape Sounio Grecotel Exclusive Resort - August 2018

vendor_name: Cape Sounio, A Grecotel Resort to Live
title: Stylish Athens Riviera Hideaway near Temple of Poseidon with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Dinner
description:
If you're dreaming of a Greek paradise with golden sands and turquoise waters, this is the resort for you. Located in Sounio, this modern oasis is set against a backdrop of rugged coastline and clear blue waters, with glimpses of the Temple of Poseidon in the distance. Find yourself surrounded by expansive private beaches and cool off in the dazzling outdoor swimming pool.

Dining is a journey in itself at this chic resort. Start off with light bites at the open-air Panorama Lounge Bar, where sunset views over the bay set a relaxed mood, or for something truly special, make your way to The Restaurant, the flagship spot serving an incredible Mediterranean-inspired menu. Spend your days exploring the majestic site of the Temple of Poseidon or traverse the walking routes through the picturesque Sounio National Park.
location_description: Cape Sounio, A Grecotel Resort to Live
